alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Jefferson; Lonoke; Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Prairie, southeastern Lonoke, central Jefferson and northwestern Arkansas Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 200 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Humnoke to near Altheimer to near Pine Bluff. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Stuttgart... Altheimer... Humphrey... Humnoke... Cottondale... Brummitt... Richardson... Madding... Stuttgart Municipal Airport... Wabbaseka... Allport... Sherrill... Gethsemane... Cornerstone... Tomberlin... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... Glenlake... Watson Chapel... Rob Roy... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
